it.polimi.sw2019.controller

Class Choices

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.sw2019.controller.Choices

  • public class Choices
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    poligenius this class is very important and used to manage choices made from the player and a large part of the logic of the game

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Choices() 
      Choices(Match match, VirtualView view, Payment payment, AtomicActions atomicActions, SingleActionManager singleActionManager)
      customize constructor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void afterEffectHandler()
      handles moves after shoot and powerups options called after the effect execution, it shows the other effects available or continue the turn if the player cannot perform any other effect
      void applyAllTargetEffect()
      apply the damage in cells chosen for all target effects
      void applyEffect()
      by reading the target class this method apply the exact number of damage and mark to every target
      void applyForcedChoiceEffect()
      apply the damage to the players for weapon effects that don't need the user to choose someone
      java.util.List<Character> availablePlayersToMove()
      method used for the vortex move effect
      java.lang.Boolean canIshoot()
      tells if the player can do a shoot action, useful after a player uses a powerup
      void damagedTargets()
      this method doSomething to the view the list of the available players that can be targeted by Targeting Scope powerup
      void effectAnalyzer()
      called after the payment session ( if the effect is not free), analyze the effect and see if there is a moveBefore inside it called the first time I select the effect
      void effectHandler()
      apply the effect and continue the turn called by moveBeforeShoot after the move, by SingleActionManager, by effectAnalyzer doSomething to the view the possible selections
      Effect getCurrentEffect() 
      Cell getMoveCell() 
      java.util.List<Player> getMovedPlayers() 
      Payment getPayment() 
      Player getSelectedPlayer() 
      Powerup getSelectedPowerup() 
      Weapon getSelectedWeapon() 
      java.util.List<Player> getShootedPlayers() 
      java.util.List<Effect> getUsedEffect() 
      void moveBeforeShootHandler(Message message)
      this method handles the selection of a player in a move before shoot action
      void playersWithCounterAttackPowerup()
      this method check the damaged players and sends a message to the view with the ones that have tagback grenade powerup to ask them if they want to use it
      void powerupEffectHandler(Message message)
      this method analyzes the powerup selected and sends messages to the view basing on the kind of powerup the player is using
      void powerupsAfterShoot()
      this method handle the possible use of powerups after a shooting action
      void reset()
      This method resets all the attributes to avoid errors the next time I receive a new payment message I have to reset everything when a new effect is used, but I don't have to reset the selectedWeapon, cause it is overwritten every time a player select one (selectedWeapon has to be set to null after the player ends the shoot action)
      void resetEverything()
      this method reset all the choices attributes in the class
      void selectionCardHandler(Message message)
      method that filters the card selection messages
      void selectionHandler(Message message)
      this method filters all the selection kind messages
      void selectionPlayerHandler(Message message)
      method that filters the player selection
      void setCurrentEffect(Effect currentEffect) 
      void setMoveCell(Cell moveCell) 
      void setMovedPlayers(java.util.List<Player> movedPlayers) 
      void setSelectedPlayer(Player selectedPlayer) 
      void setSelectedPowerup(Powerup selectedPowerup) 
      void setSelectedWeapon(Weapon selectedWeapon) 
      void setShootedPlayers(java.util.List<Player> shootedPlayers) 
      void updateVisibilityAllTarget()
      this method sends new options to the player by watching the other players chosen and the effect that is being executed done for all target effect (options are Cell)
      void updateVisibilityMultiple()
      this method sends new options to the player by watching the other players chosen and the effect that is being executed done for multiple target effect (options are players)
      void usePowerupHandler(Message message)
      this method handles the selection of a player in an use powerup action
      void weaponHandler(Message message)
      Method that receive the weapon and analyze it to doSomething options to the view

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • reset

        public void reset()
        This method resets all the attributes to avoid errors the next time I receive a new payment message I have to reset everything when a new effect is used, but I don't have to reset the selectedWeapon, cause it is overwritten every time a player select one (selectedWeapon has to be set to null after the player ends the shoot action)

      • resetEverything

        public void resetEverything()
        this method reset all the choices attributes in the class

        public void powerupEffectHandler(Message message)

        Parameters:

      • damagedTargets

        public void damagedTargets()
        this method doSomething to the view the list of the available players that can be targeted by Targeting Scope powerup

        public void weaponHandler(Message message)

        Parameters:

      • afterEffectHandler

        public void afterEffectHandler()
        handles moves after shoot and powerups options called after the effect execution, it shows the other effects available or continue the turn if the player cannot perform any other effect

      • powerupsAfterShoot

        public void powerupsAfterShoot()
        this method handle the possible use of powerups after a shooting action

      • effectHandler

        public void effectHandler()
        apply the effect and continue the turn called by moveBeforeShoot after the move, by SingleActionManager, by effectAnalyzer doSomething to the view the possible selections

      • updateVisibilityMultiple

        public void updateVisibilityMultiple()
        this method sends new options to the player by watching the other players chosen and the effect that is being executed done for multiple target effect (options are players)

      • updateVisibilityAllTarget

        public void updateVisibilityAllTarget()
        this method sends new options to the player by watching the other players chosen and the effect that is being executed done for all target effect (options are Cell)

        public void applyEffect()

      • effectAnalyzer

        public void effectAnalyzer()
        called after the payment session ( if the effect is not free), analyze the effect and see if there is a moveBefore inside it called the first time I select the effect

        public java.util.List<Character> availablePlayersToMove()
        method used for the vortex move effect
        Returns:
        characters you can move
